changes.change: the 'results/items/roles/items/' response's property type/format changed from 'object'/'' to 'string'/'' for status '200'
added discriminator to 'results/items/' response property
added '#/components/schemas/GroupPendingUserResponse, #/components/schemas/GroupActiveUserResponse' to the 'results/items/' response property 'oneOf' list for the response
the response required property 'results/items/username' became read-only

added the new 'GROUP_BACKUP_MANAGER, GROUP_CLUSTER_MANAGER, GROUP_DATABASE_ACCESS_ADMIN, GROUP_DATA_ACCESS_ADMIN, GROUP_DATA_ACCESS_READ_ONLY, GROUP_DATA_ACCESS_READ_WRITE, GROUP_OBSERVABILITY_VIEWER, GROUP_OWNER, GROUP_READ_ONLY, GROUP_SEARCH_INDEX_EDITOR, GROUP_STREAM_PROCESSING_OWNER' enum values to the 'results/items/roles/items/' response property
added the required property 'results/items/orgMembershipStatus' to the response

removed the required properties 'results/items/country, results/items/emailAddress, results/items/firstName, results/items/lastName, results/items/mobileNumber, results/items/password' from the response

removed the optional properties 'results/items/createdAt, results/items/lastAuth, results/items/links, results/items/roles/items/groupId, results/items/roles/items/orgId, results/items/roles/items/roleName, results/items/teamIds' from the response
the response properties 'results/items/id, results/items/roles' became required
the response optional property 'results/items/roles' became read-only
